title: Dávid Kondrlík
text:
Dávid Kondrlík (born 31 May 1997) is a <a href="Slovakia">Slovak</a> <a href="Association%20football">football</a> forward who currently plays for <a href="TJ%20Sokol%20Lan%C5%BEhot">Sokol Lanžhot</a>.
Club career.
FC DAC 1904 Dunajská Streda.
Kondrlík made his <a href="Slovak%20First%20Football%20League">Fortuna Liga</a> debut for <a href="FC%20DAC%201904%20Dunajsk%C3%A1%20Streda">DAC Dunajská Streda</a> against <a href="Spartak%20Myjava">Spartak Myjava</a> on 2 August 2016.
